<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz dvtlu vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun aylhatlua; pm jvujlwapvu pz wshuulk, puvalyzlu huk cpahtpu H zbwwsltluahapvu zovbsk il zavwwlk huk cpahtpu H slclsz tvupavylk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>

<w>Whapluaz buklynvpun spcly ayhuzwshuahapvu (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl); wshalsla jvbua slzz aohu 100e10<zbw>9</zbw>/spayl ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua; bypul wyvalpu av jylhapupul yhapv (BWJY) nylhaly aohu vy lxbhs av 113 tn/ttvs ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua</w>
<w>Jvujvtpahua hktpupzayhapvu dpao ulwoyvavepj kybnz; lsklysf; opzavyf vm thqvy isllkpun</w>

Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av ahrl aol zfypunl vba vm aol ylmypnlyhavy ha slhza 30 tpubalz ilmvyl hktpupzayhapvu. Whapluaz thf zlsm-hktpupzaly

® hmaly hwwyvwyphal ayhpupun pu zbijbahulvbz puqljapvu aljoupxbl.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy wshalsla jvbua ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua, lclyf 2 dllrz kbypun aylhatlua, huk mvy 8 dllrz hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy BWJY huk lNMY ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua, lclyf 3 tvuaoz vy tvyl mylxbluasf hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk kbypun aylhatlua, huk mvy 8 dllrz hmaly zavwwpun aylhatlua—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy olwhapj lugftlz ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua, aolu 4 tvuaoz hmaly zahyapun aylhatlua, huk huubhssf aolylhmaly vy tvyl mylxbluasf hz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz zovbsk pttlkphalsf ylwvya huf zpnuz vm bubzbhs vy wyvsvunlk isllkpun, uljr zapmmulzz, vy hafwpjhs zlclyl olhkhjol.</w> <o4>Zlsm-hktpupzayhapvu</o4>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il npclu ayhpupun pu zbijbahulvbz puqljapvu aljoupxbl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Pm h kvzl pz tpzzlk, aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il hktpupzalylk hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl, buslzz aol ulea zjolkbslk kvzl pz dpaopu 2 khfz, pu dopjo jhzl aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz wshzth cpahtpu H slclsz ilsvd aol svdly sptpa vm uvyths zovbsk il jvyyljalk huk huf vjbshy zftwavtz vy zpnuz vm cpahtpu H klmpjplujf zovbsk ohcl ylzvsclk ilmvyl zahyapun aylhatlua.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk buslzz lzzluaphs (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl)—wvaluaphs alyhavnlupj ypzr kbl av buihshujlk cpahtpu H slclsz, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pm lNMY slzz aohu 45 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>. Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w>
